column5: Very bright and open, clean, modern and recently updated house.  Open floor plan, black granite and stainless steel appliances and fully equipped with everything you need for cooking, entertainment, and enjoying the area.  Centrally located between Dallas and McKinney and minutes away from: - State Farm HQs and University of Texas Dallas campus (UTD)  Cities of - Dallas - Frisco - Richardson - Allen - Addison - Fairview  Easy access to 3 major highways: 75, George Bush and Hwy 121.
column8: Central Plano - near Dallas, Frisco, Richardson
